title: [Neuroscience] While researchers have discovered numerous cell types in the brain, this atlas of all cell types in one area -- the primary motor cortex -- is the first comprehensive list and a starting point for tracing cellular networks to understand how they control our body and mind
[Medicine] Worsening depression cuts survival in lung cancer patients, study of 157 patients finds. This is the first study to link the path of psychological symptoms to lifespan in lung cancer.
